珌字的基本解释

珌
bì
刀鞘下端的装饰：“君子至止，鞞琫有珌。”

珌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》卑吉切，入質，幫。］
古代刀鞘末端的装饰。《诗·小雅·瞻彼洛矣》：“鞸琫有珌。”毛传：“鞸，容刀鞸也。琫，上飾；珌，下飾。”《汉书·王莽传上》：“於是莽稽首再拜，受緑韍衮冕衣裳，瑒琫瑒珌。”一说指剑柄与剑身相接处的玉饰。

珌字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　珌； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页730第02
〔古文〕㻫【唐韻】?吉切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】壁吉切，?音必。【說文】佩刀下飾。天子以玉。【詩·小雅】鞞琫有珌。【傳】珌下飾。【前漢·王莽傳】瑒琫瑒珌。【註】佩刀之飾，上曰琫，下曰珌。　又人名。【後漢·獻帝紀】督軍校尉周珌。　又【集韻】必結切，音㢼。義同。

Jue
Basic explanation of words
Jue
bì
The decoration on the lower end of the scabbard: "The gentleman is at the end, and there is a 珌 in Yun."
Jue
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" Beiji cuts, enters the quality, helps. ]
Decoration on the end of an ancient scabbard. "Poetry·Xiaoya·Zhan Biluowen": "Yuan Ling has a 珌." Mao Chuan: "Yuan, Rong Dao Yuan also. 琫, upper decoration; 珌, lower decoration." "Han Shu·Wang Mang Chuan 1": "So the head of Mangji worshipped again, and he was adorned by the green dragon, Yon Yung Yon Yon." One said that he pointed to the jade ornament where the hilt of the sword meets the sword body.
Jue
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　珌; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 730 No. 02
〔古文〕㻫【Tang Yun】? Jiqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】【Zhengyun】Biji cut, and the sound must be. [Said the text] The lower part of the saber. The emperor takes jade. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Yan Ling has a Luo. 【Biography】Jun Xia ornaments. [Previous Han·Wang Mang's Biography] Rongrong. [Note] The decoration of the saber, the upper is called 琫, the lower is called 珌.　Another name. [Later Han·Xiandi Ji] Warlord's school lieutenant Zhou Jue.　[Jiyun] must be knotted, sound 㢼. The same meaning.
